title: (x) script "e" - Zapfino {Yves}
content:
Oh my god. The \_e\_ strikes again!   
   
: )
author: jmc

comments.content:
I think the point is that if the font is a rip off of another font, it would be unethical of us to respond with details on how one might find that illegally produced and morally unsound font. Wether that be telling you directly or pointing you somewhere where that information could be found.   
   
This is why people are not responding, Elithabeth. This part of the forums is for the identification of fonts, and kind members of the forums have done this for you, taking time and trouble, without payment.   
   
It is not for finding illegal fonts.
If you are not willing to believe us on matters as serious as this, why are you posting here?
